maqras.text: 54|9|Kare-ra izen ni, nufu no min mo (sono yogen-sha o) kyogi to shi, waga shimo be o uso-tsuki yobawari shi,`kichigaidesu.' To itte tsuiho shita.
54|10|Sore de kare wa omoni,`watashi wa, hontoni chikaratsukimashita. Do ka o tasuke kudasai.' To inotta.
54|11|Sorede ware wa, ten no sho mon o hiraki mizu o sosogi fura seta.
54|12|Mata daichi ni moroizumi o funshutsu sa se, mizu wa awasari, kanete no kami inochi ni yoru koto (kozui) ga okita.
54|13|Shikashi ware wa ita to kugi de tsukutta mono (hakobune) ni kare o nosete yatta.
54|14|Waga mimamoru naka de sore wa hashitta. Kore ga (mina kara) shirizoke rareta ano mono e no mukuidearu.
54|15|Ware wa kore o hitotsu no shirushi to shite nokoshita. Sate dare ka satoru mono wa aru ka.
54|16|Sa waga chobatsu to imashime to wa dodeatta ka.
54|17|Hontoni ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sa, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|18|Ado (no min) mo (shinri o) kyogidearu to shita. Sorede waga chobatsu to imashime to wa dodeatta ka.
54|19|Ware wa saiyaku no uchitsudzuku hi ni, kare-ra ni taishi arekuruu kaze o okutta.
54|20|Suruto ningen wa, nekosogi ni natta. Natsumeyashi no kirikabu no yo ni, mushiri sara reta.
54|21|Ano toki no waga chobatsu to imashime to wa dodeatta ka.
54|22|Makotoni ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku tokiakashita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|23|Samudo (mo mata) keikoku o kyogidearu to shita.
54|24|Soshite kare-ra wa itta. `Nani to, watashi-tachi no naka no ikkai no ningende wanaidesu ka. Doshite kon'na mono ni shitagaimasu ka. Sore koso jado, kichigaizatadesu.
54|25|Watashi-tachi no ma de kare dake ni keiji ga kudasa reta nodesu ka. Iya, kare wa ouso-tsukidesu.'
54|26|(Ose rareta. ) `Kare-ra wa ashita shirudearou. Dochira ga daiuso-tsukidearu ka o.
54|27|Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra o kokoromiru tame mesu rakuda o okurudearou. Anata wa taeshinobi kare-ra o mimamore.
54|28|Soshite kare-ra ni rakuda to mizu o bunpai shi, junban ni nomu yo tsutae nasai.
54|29|Daga kare-ra wa nakama o yobiyose, sono otoko wa (ken o) te ni toru to hiza no ken o kitte shimatta.
54|30|Sonotoki no waga chobatsu to imashime to ga dodeatta ka.
54|31|Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra ni mukakkate (mimi o tsunzaku) hitokoe o kudasu to, kare-ra wa kachiku no kakoi ni tsukawareru kare kabu no yo ni natta.
54|32|Ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|33|Ruto no min mo keikoku o kyogidearu to shita.
54|34|Ware wa saseki no arashi o kare-ra ni okutta. Ruto no kazoku dake wa betsudeatta. Reimei ni kare-ra o sukui,
54|35|ware kara no onkei to shita. Ko no yo ni ware wa kansha suru mono ni mukuiru.
54|36|(Ruto wa) waga chobatsu o kare-ra ni keikoku shita nodaga, kare-ra wa sono keikoku ni tsuite giwaku no nen o daita.
54|37|Soshite kare no hinkyaku (tenshi) o, kare kara ubaou to shitanode, ware wa kare-ra no me o tsubushita. `Sa, waga chobatsu to keikoku o ajiwae.'
54|38|Akuru asa, eien no chobatsu ga kare-ra ni kudatta.
54|39|`Sa waga chobatsu to keikoku o ajiwae.'
54|40|Ware wa, kuruan o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sa, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|41|Hontoni firuaun no ichizoku ni mo keikoku-sha ga tsukawasa reta.
54|42|(Daga) ware no shuju no shirushi o kyogidearu to shita. Sorede ware wa, idaide kyoryokuna mono no 一摑 Mi de, kare-ra o toraeta.
54|43|Anata gata fushinjin-sha (kuraishu-zoku) no kata ga, korera no mono yori mo sugurete iru no ka. Soretomo Keisuke no naka ni anata gata no tame no shamen ga aru no ka.
54|44|Soretomo kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa mina shori o eru monodesu.' To demo iu no ka.
54|45|Yagate korera no hitobito wa yabure sari, nige sarudearou.
54|46|Iya (shinpan no)-ji wa, kare-ra ni yakusoku sa reta kigendearu. Shikamo sono tokiniha, mottomo nagekawashi mottomo kurushi me ni audearou.
54|47|Hontoni korera no tsumi o okashite iru-sha-tachi wa, meimo to chobatsu no uchi ni aru.
54|48|Hi no naka ni kao o shita ni shite hikizura reru sonohi, kare-ra wa,`moka no fure guai o ajiwai nasai.'(To iwa reyou).
54|49|Hontoni ware wa subete no jibutsu o, kichinto hakatte sozo shita.
54|50|Mata waga meirei wa tada hitokoto, Shun no yona monodearu.
54|51|Ware wa kore made, anata gata (makka no tashinkyo to) no dorui o horoboshita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|52|Kare-ra no shogyo wa, shosatsu ni subete kiroku sa rete iru.
54|53|Daisho subete no koto ga, hitoshiku kakitome rarete iru.
54|54|Hontoni omo o osoreru mono wa,-en to kawa no aru,
54|55|zen'no no oja no omoto no, shinri no za ni (sumu nodearu).
